snippet.title: Feudums - Pre-Alpha Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
Feudums is an upcoming, approachable, indie grand strategy game with community-driven narrative. Click "Show More" for Steam and other links!

This is a small footage of various in-game moments related to managing a feudum, hiring garrisons, rallying companies and encountering hostile armies.

Subscribe our channel to make sure you won't miss our news, in-progress developer videos or tutorials!


Wishlist Feudums on Steam: 
• https://store.steampowered.com/app/473750/Feudums/

Get the latest pre-alpha demo from our website or from a trusted mirror like itch.io or indieDB:
• Links to downloads: https://feudums.com/download
• NEW! You can now also grab it from our Steam page!

Follow the game to learn more:

• Website: https://www.feudums.com/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/feudums
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/feudumsmmo/
• GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Feudums

Support us so we can do more in less time:
• Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/feudums


#indiegame #medieval #strategygame #simulationgames #mmo #multiplayer #indiedev #indiegames #indiegamedev #gamerplay
